Home.title: Welcome to Devio
Home.description: Where your ideas come to life, block by block.

Projects.title: Latest Projects
Projects.description: Our projects reflect our expertise and commitment to excellence. Each creation is designed to deliver a unique, stable, and immersive Minecraft experience.

CTA.title: Interested?
CTA.description: Let's talk about your project! Our team will guide you step by step, from concept to launch. Join us on Discord to receive a free quote tailored to your needs.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our services.

project.question: How does a project work?
project.answer: It all starts with a thorough discussion on Discord to understand your needs. Then, we provide a free quote before starting development.

delivery.question: What are your delivery times?
delivery.answer: Delivery times vary depending on the complexity of the project and our current schedule. Contact us on Discord for a personalized estimate.

tech.question: What technologies do you use?
tech.answer: We mainly use Java, Kotlin, Forge, Fabric, Spigot, Paper, Purpur, MCP, and other tools from the Minecraft ecosystem to deliver robust and custom solutions.

Banner.text: Need a Minecraft plugin or mod? Join us on Discord for a personalized quote, fast response, and competitive pricing.
